subject: Portuguese customs
description_text:
Hello,

I'm considering purchasing a set of your pedals. I’m located in Portugal
and would like to know if there’s a chance the pedals could be held by
Portuguese customs, since your company is based in China.
Do you ship from within the European Union in such cases, or would the
order be sent directly from China?

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards,
Daniel Costa

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Daniel,  Hello, which model do you need?

Im looking for pro plus load cell

A quinta, 5/06/2025, 05:28, service@simsonn.com

Hi Carlos Daniel,     Please take a look at this latest pedal model — it features a 200kg sensor and also supports a vibration module. The vibration module and power supply need to be purchased separately. Feel free to explore and learn more about it.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals

But you didnt answer my question.

A sexta, 6/06/2025, 04:36, service@simsonn.com

Hi Carlos Daniel,  Our PlusX pedals are expected to arrive at the German warehouse around June 15th. You can purchase the pedals directly from the German warehouse and enjoy tax-free benefits. Currently, the VAM vibration motors are only available from the China warehouse and are sold without tax; however, due to their low value, the customs duties are minimal.

and about the pro plus load cell ?


service@simsonn.com
Hi Carlos Daniel,  Pro Plus pedals still have some silver versions in the German warehouse, but no more black ones. You can buy it without any problem, it doesn't require any additional taxes.
